languages.text: {n}Свирепо ухмыльнувшись, Ульфар с нескрываемой радостью произносит:{/n} "Чую в воздухе запах крови, что вот-вот прольется. Слышу эхо сталкивающихся мечей и устрашенные крики ксеносов, корчащихся под нашей пятой. Всеотец, что за чудесный бранный пир уготовил ты для меня!"

{n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Свирепо ухмыльнувшись, Ульфар с нескрываемой радостью произносит:{/n} "Чую в воздухе запах крови, что вот-вот прольется. Слышу эхо сталкивающихся мечей и устрашенные крики ксеносов, корчащихся под нашей пятой. Всеотец, что за чудесный бранный пир уготовил ты для меня!"

I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of the xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast it is that you have prepared for me!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of the xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast it is that you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire féroce, Ulfar dit d'une joie non dissimulée :{/n} « Je sens dans l'air une odeur de sang sur le point de se répandre. J'entends l'écho des épées qui s'entrechoquent et les cris terrifiés des xénos qui agonisent sous nos pieds. Père de Tous, quel merveilleux festin tu m'as préparé ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire féroce, Ulfar dit d'une joie non dissimulée :{/n} « Je sens dans l'air une odeur de sang sur le point de se répandre. J'entends l'écho des épées qui s'entrechoquent et les cris terrifiés des xénos qui agonisent sous nos pieds. Père de Tous, quel merveilleux festin tu m'as préparé ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法狂野地笑着，声音中带着毫不掩饰的喜悦。{/n}“我几乎已经闻到了四溢的血腥，我听到了刀剑碰撞的回响，以及我们脚下那些异形恐怖的尖叫声。全父啊，你为我准备了如此美妙的盛宴！”
languages.original_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法狂野地笑着，声音中带着毫不掩饰的喜悦。{/n}“我几乎已经闻到了四溢的血腥，我听到了刀剑碰撞的回响，以及我们脚下那些异形恐怖的尖叫声。全父啊，你为我准备了如此美妙的盛宴！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}残忍な笑みを浮かべながら、ウルファーは喜びを露わにした。{/n}「今にもこぼれ落ちそうな血の匂いがする。剣がぶつかり合う音と、俺たちに足蹴にされて悶える異種族の怯えた悲鳴が聞こえるな。全知の父よ、あなたが俺のために用意してくださったのは、なんと素晴らしい狂宴なのだろう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}残忍な笑みを浮かべながら、ウルファーは喜びを露わにした。{/n}「今にもこぼれ落ちそうな血の匂いがする。剣がぶつかり合う音と、俺たちに足蹴にされて悶えるゼノの怯えた悲鳴が聞こえるな。全知の父よ、あなたが俺のために用意してくださったのは、なんと素晴らしい狂宴なのだろう！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar grinst wie ein Wilder und sagt unverhohlen freudig:{/n} "Bald wird Blut fließen, ich rieche es schon in der Luft. Ich höre, wie Schwerter klirren und wie Xenos entsetzlich schreien, wenn sie sich unter unseren Absätzen winden. Allvater, welch herrliches Festmahl Ihr für mich vorgesehen habt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar grinst wie ein Wilder und sagt unverhohlen freudig:{/n} "Bald wird Blut fließen, ich rieche es schon in der Luft. Ich höre, wie Schwerter klirren und wie Xenos entsetzlich schreien, wenn sie sich unter unseren Absätzen winden. Allvater, welch herrliches Festmahl Ihr für mich vorgesehen habt!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar esboza una brutal sonrisa sin apenas contener el júbilo.{/n} «El aire huele a la sangre que está a punto de derramarse. Oigo el eco de las espadas al entrechocar y los gritos aterrados de los xenos retorciéndose bajo las suelas de nuestras botas. ¡Oh, Padre de Todo, me has preparado un festín maravilloso!».
languages.original_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar esboza una brutal sonrisa sin apenas contener el júbilo.{/n} «El aire huele a la sangre que está a punto de derramarse. Oigo el eco de las espadas al entrechocar y los gritos aterrados de los xenos retorciéndose bajo las suelas de nuestras botas. ¡Oh, Padre de Todo, me has preparado un festín maravilloso!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, vahşise sırıtıp apaçık bir neşeyle konuşuyor.{/n} "Havada kan konusu var. Dökülmek üzere olan kanın kokusu. Çarpışan kılıçların ve ayaklarımızın altında kıvranan zenoların korku dolu çığlıklarını duyabiliyorum. Yücebaba, benim için ne muhteşem bir ziyafet hazırlamışsın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Grinning savagely, Ulfar says with undisguised joy,{/n} "I smell blood in the air — blood that is about to be spilt. I hear the echo of clashing swords and the terrified screams of xenos writhing under our heel. Allfather, what a marvellous feast you have prepared for me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar vahşice sırıtıyor ve apaçık bir neşeyle konuşuyor:{/n} "Havada kan konusu var. Dökülmek üzere olan kanın kokusu. Çarpışan kılıçların ve ayaklarımızın altında kıvranan zenoların korku dolu çığlıklarını duyabiliyorum. Yücebaba, benim için ne de muhteşem bir ziyafet hazırlamışsın!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
